T02D3504:154a-1: mri tyu banytsa no pa de sha t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3504:154a-3: 'chi ba slu ba'i man ngag gi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D3504:154a-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3504:154a-5: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02D3504:154a-6: langs nas snga dro'i thun la'o //
T02D3504:154a-7: bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste //
T02D3504:154a-8: rang gi snying gar zla ba la //
T02D3504:154a-9: lnga pa yi ni dang po la //
T02D3504:154a-10: dbyangs yig gnyis pa rab tu sbyar //
T02D3504:154a-11: zla phyed thig le yang dag ldan //
T02D3504:154a-12: 'od zer dkar pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D3504:154a-13: de yi 'od zer dkar po yis //
T02D3504:154a-14: mkha' la sgrol ma gdan drangs te //
T02D3504:154a-15: phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar mo la //
T02D3504:154a-16: mchog sbyin dang ni autpal bsnams //
T02D3504:154a-17: nyer spyod lnga yi mchod pa yi //
T02D3504:154a-18: gus pa yis ni mchod byas nas //
T02D3504:154a-19: sdig pa bshags shing phyi nas ni //
T02D3504:154a-20: de nas bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02D3504:154a-21: de ni yongs su bsngo ba dang //
T02D3504:154a-22: de bzhin gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D3504:154a-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3504:154a-24: zhes pa'i sngags kyis stong par bsgom //
T02D3504:154a-25: rnal 'byor pa yi cho ga yis //
T02D3504:154a-26: chu skyes dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3504:154a-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
T02D3504:154a-28: sngon gsungs sa bon las skyes pa'i //
T02D3504:154a-29: lha mo sgrol ma yid 'ong ma //
T02D3504:154a-30: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas //
T02D3504:154a-31: mchog sbyin ma ni autpal bsnams //
T02D3504:154a-32: ston ka'i zla ba lta bu ni //
T02D3504:154a-33: zla ba'i steng du yang dag bzhugs //
T02D3504:154b-0: rgyan rnams thams @154b cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D3504:154b-1: bcu drug lo yi gzugs can ma //
T02D3504:154b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad de yi sras //
T02D3504:154b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma snying gar bsgom //
T02D3504:154b-6: re'u mig brgyad po rnams la ni //
T02D3504:154b-7: yi ge brgyad kyis yongs su bskor //
T02D3504:154b-8: aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa //
T02D3504:154b-9: bsgrub bya'i ming sogs lte ba la //
T02D3504:154b-10: mkhas pas rtse gcig yid kyis ni //
T02D3504:154b-11: nges pa brtan pas zla drug bsgom //
T02D3504:154b-12: yi ge bcu yi gsang sngags 'di //
T02D3504:154b-13: mkhas bas mi skyo'i yid kyis bzlas //
T02D3504:154b-14: aom yig dang po sbyin par bya //
T02D3504:154b-15: phyi nas t'a re rab tu sbyar //
T02D3504:154b-16: tutt'a re yi tu re phyis //
T02D3504:154b-17: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can las kun byed //
T02D3504:154b-18: tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang //
T02D3504:154b-19: drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang //
T02D3504:154b-20: ba spu'i rtse mo'ang gcod mi nus //
T02D3504:154b-21: 'chi bdag las rgyal grol ba bzhin //
T02D3504:154b-22: skra dkar gnyer ma skal ldan dang //
T02D3504:154b-23: nang dang dbul sogs mdor bsdus na //
T02D3504:154b-24: seng ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad //
T02D3504:154b-25: sdug bsngal tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms //
T02D3504:154b-26: bskul pa med par zas la sogs //
T02D3504:154b-27: khang bzangs gos la sogs pa thob //
T02D3504:154b-28: ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs dang //
T02D3504:154b-29: bum pa bzang po la sogs 'grub ;
T02D3504:154b-30: / snyan ngag dang ni smra ba mkhas //
T02D3504:154b-31: blo rno shes rab dri ma med //
T02D3504:154b-32: gzhan yang 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams //
